JobFullDesc: The Datacenter EMEA Cost Estimator is responsible for the development and maintenance of estimates and cost targets for all datacenter builds in their region. This role will be concentrated on special projects globally and EMEA and will entail Cost Estimating as the overall role. The Estimator will manage all cost estimates, cost data, communications, schedule meetings and be a point of contact between internal and external parties for specific projects or regions being supported. The Estimator will work closely with engineering, construction, procurement, security, networking, and operations teams throughout each project and ensure cost information developed and managed meets the requirements of those specific project needs. The Estimator will report directly to the Regional Lead Estimating Manager and will have daily interactions within the Estimating group. Specific Job Tasks: Manage and develop all Estimates and cost analysis for the region and projects assignedSupport the development and updating of existing and new technology Plans of RecordProvide regular report-outs and reviews with partner teams, internal teams and senior leadership regarding the scope, schedule and budgets for the regions assignedSupport the ongoing updates of the Campus and Regional Cost targets for the assigned region Partner will all groups at Microsoft that touch or interact with our Datacenter build projects, ensuring alignment along all sectors in the development and review of estimate provided for datacenters or special program  Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer.
